reviews.text: I booked this hotel not knowing what to expect, but was certainly pleasantly surprised! The hotel is an easy walk from Termini rail station and is convenient to central Rome at a great price. The outside of the building makes no mention of the guesthouse/pensione on the inside other than a small nameplate next to the buzzer. Three buzzes and three floors later I was there! The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful, going out of the way to get me settled in and ensure that I was able to meet up with my friends. The room was basic, but spotlessly clean with satellite TV and remote control thermostat. If I were spending all of my time in the room, I would have chosen another hotel, but for a clean, comfortable place to sleep at a great price, I'll be sure to return when I'm in Rome!
reviews.title: Great for the price!

likes.liked: — Great staff and service! Exceptionally clean!
